document_data.name: Shoulree Talaeth
document_data.home: [[Elven Court]]In ''Spellfire '88'', she is referred to as an inhabitant of Elven Court. This is removed in ''Spellfire '05''.
document_data.mainbody: '''Shoulree Talaeth''' was a wielder of [[spellfire]] from the [[Elven Court]] at some point prior to {{yearlink|700}}.
document_data.History:
Per [[Elminster Aumar]] on {{yearlink|1356}}, she had been an inhabitant of the [[Elven Court]] and a wielder of [[spellfire]] in the days of [[Myth Drannor]]. When inquired by [[Lhaeo]], he claimed to doubt she yet walked the earth, implying she was most likely dead.

Elminster also owned some of her gowns in that year, which he loaned to [[Shandril Shessair]].
